summary_detail.value: Liberty Fire Security Officer Bruce Butler gives a brief but concise summary of the role of law enforcement officer but at the Incident Command Post and out in the field.Link to video interview of LF security

title: LF Base Camp Security Officer explains security functions on a wildfire. (Liberty Fire Wildfire)
